CustomField.description: URL for the logo image to display in the timeout modal
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a full URL (https://...), Salesforce static resource path (/resource/ResourceName), or document link. Examples: • External URL: https://yourdomain.com/images/logo.png • Static Resource: /resource/CompanyLogo • Experience Cloud: /img/communityLogo.png Image will be displayed at max-height: 60px in the modal.
CustomField.label: Logo Url
